Html:
Hi,

Im planing to create an application where I will be using 4 different colour markers and I will be generating 3-D models on the positions of these markers. I have a few questions.

1. Is there a way to find the X-Axis of these markers.

2. Methods to get a good FPS. ( I have experienced that anything over two markers become slow in Touchless SDK 1.0)

I would really appriciate a response.

Thanks
